Reviews.Title: “Great location and rooms, don't be put off by austere architecture”
Reviews.Author: MargaretJonesLondon
Reviews.Content: This is a very pleasant hotel to stay in in Berlin. The rooms ooze luxury with great bathrooms too. The breakfast choice is one of the best I've ever come across, you name it, and I think you'll find they've got it. All beautifully cooked too. The lunch I had here was also superb - simply fabulous food. The hotel is well located near public transport and shopping places. It looks like a concrete 60/70s building from the outside, but don't be put off, rest and relaxation and great service greet you inside. The one draw back for such a good hotel is that there were no tea/coffee making facilities in the room, which was a pity.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: Neil W
Reviews.Content: We loved the hotel - the room was great, the hotel is very attractive, the staff - reception, bar, and breakfast room, and cleaning staff, were all friendly, helpful, and happy to serve. The breakfast buffet is one of the best we have ever experienced - range and choice, variety, freshness - bread, fruit, cheese, meats, cereal, yoghurts, ... even champagne! and an Easter bunny for those who wanted it! Wonderful!

Reviews.Title: “Stay in Berlin”
Reviews.Author: dardik4
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel. Excellent location. Big rooms (Mine: 921).Excellent staff ready to help with a smile and everything quickly.Endless Breakfast .Huge selection of food & drinks.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, nice room and the restaurant is awesome!”
Reviews.Author: oztraveller65
Reviews.Content: I had a long long Easter weekend in Berlin and booked this hotel because of the offer and the location. I'm not disappointed. 5 minutes walk from Zoologischer Garten after leaving the X9 airport bus. It was 12 noon and my room was not ready until 3pm. Left my backpack with reception and went for a stroll along Ku'damm, had lunch and coffee there. Back to the hotel and got my room. It's huge and very spacious. The best of the hotel is the restaurant - it's a proper French restaurant and the dishes are just exccellent - very nice.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service and great breakfast”
Reviews.Author: MauriceTrip
Reviews.Content: Try to get the Weekend package: it includes breakfast and a late checkout until 6 pm. Although the lobby is basic, and location just in the shopping area (no shops open on Sundays), the rooms, service and breakfast are truly 5-star.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, brilliant location, fantastic staff!”
Reviews.Author: JamesDingle102
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 4 nights at the Hotel Concorde during March, and loved every minute. Berlin is a fantastic city, and the people there are great. Checked on TA beforehand and some very good reviews, obviously the odd person who thinks its rubbish, but there's always one! The hotel is huge, about 12 floors, we stayed on floor 10, and had a deluxe double room, was very nice, a good size too. All of the staff there are very helpful, the people on the door are very helpful too, and reception very good. When we arrived we received a nice surprise in the room which was some strawberries and raspberries and some dipping chocolate, very nice :) Rooms are very modern, big bed, large wardrobe area and bathroom. The location is fantastic, 5mins from the incredible Berlin Zoo, its so easy to get about, and there are some great shops nearby. Lots of places to eat, Hard Rock Cafe is about 2mins away, and there are all the regular city hangouts like Starbucks etc very close by. We walked for about 30mins and visited some excellent sites, Berlin Wall, Holocaust Memorial, Brandenberg Gate, and the amazing Sony Centre which is an incredible piece of architecture. Highly recommended, no question I would definitely stay there again! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel”
Reviews.Author: IreneKija
Reviews.Content: We stayed for the 2nd time. And what shall we say, it was even better then the first time in 2009. We spent 2 nights, and have been excited. Spacious and lightfull rooms. Wunderfull service, friendly and helpful staff. The breakfast offers a big various of tasty food. Check in and Check out was done very quickly. And with some steps we have been at the Kurfürstendamm, Tiergarten (zoo), Gedächtniskirche and some more sightseeing atractions from Berlin. We will visit the Concorde Hotel Berlin surly again

Reviews.Title: “Excellent business hotel in good location”
Reviews.Author: JerseyBean007
Reviews.Content: Stayed in hotel for business, on club floor. Rooms are very modern, spacious and well maintained and clean. Club is good value with breakfast, all day refreshments and evening drinks and nibbles. Staff friendly and helpful. Would also be good for leisure stays, well located for shops and zoo.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Once Again”
Reviews.Author: Oberoi_SahlHasheesh
Reviews.Content: This is the second time I have stayed at this hotel for ITB in Berlin and it was truly delightful. The greeeting of the doormen in smart uniforms sets the tone for the stay. It is ideal for the business traveller. The rooms are spacious and well adorned. The staff are wonderful. Look forward to staying here again next year. Keep up the good work.

Reviews.Title: “Your Money's Worth”
Reviews.Author: PaullMD
Reviews.Content: The relatively new Hotel Concorde sits in a central location with access to the best of Berlin. The hotel is beautiful and dramatic in its reception area, and the rooms are outstanding in their own right. We were upgraded to a larger room than initially booked, with a view out over the city from floor to cieling windows. The Staff was attentive to a fault, friendly, and appreciative or our needs. We were moved to send a letter of commendation to the Manager regarding front desk and support team members. We did not try the restaurant, but the neighborhood had plenty of inexpensive and high quality alternatives.

Reviews.Title: “Rooms quite small great location”
Reviews.Author: Perrott
Reviews.Content: My Wife and I stayed in the Concorde in Berlin for three nights on a weekend and we were dissaponited with the room as it was quite small. The cleanliness of the room was excellent but the air con seemed to have a mind of it's own an turned itself on in the middle of the night which was annoying. The reception, bar and reception was also quite small and did not have much atmosphere and certainly looked different than what was shown in the website. The location I have to say was excellent and was almost right the Ku, damm and the main shopping areas much to the delight of my Wife. The service was good and the Staff were very helpful but I don't I would stay in the Concorde again because I think it's more suited the business traveller.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel - Faultless”
Reviews.Author: JonBradshaw
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on business last year for 4 days. Great rooms Great food Excellent Bar, Brilliant Service and a great location. I loved the spa area - the cold tub is a real experience

Reviews.Title: “Smart hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: Lucy887
Reviews.Content: We got a free upgrade on arrival, which was fantastic. The staff were very friendly and accomodating, the hotel itself is smart, upmarket and clean, with minimalistic decor. We had the 30Euro per night bonus voucher, which meant that 30E got knocked of your restuarant/bar bill each night you were there, which was great and menat we could afford to eat at the slightly pricy restuarant in the hotel one night, and treat ourselves to champagne etc (we were celebrating a birthday). We liked the gym and wellness centre, which has a plunge pool, sauna and steam room, and is great to use in the winter when it is so cold outside. They suggest you don't wear swimwear, which I wasnt too comfy with, but we were alone in there, so that was ok! It is in a great location, with the Kurfurstendamm U that takes you across into East Berlin right outside, and the Zoo S-Bahn a 5 minute walk away, and loads of shops and sights on your doorstep. It is in a busy shopping district, but still has lots of smaller quieter streets around so you can find cosy bars and restuarants for a drink in the evening or food in the day.

Reviews.Title: “Good investment”
Reviews.Author: Ekaterina_H
Reviews.Content: Good hotel, prime location, "abwechslungsreich" breakfast (especially on the weekend it is open till 12 o'clock). Free wi-fi on the room, helpfull and nice people. So fully recommended!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with no pool”
Reviews.Author: Bojannn
Reviews.Content: Reservation was made over hotels site and all wishes which I wrote during reservation (higher floor, bed type...) was in the system and we got room exactly we asked. Check-in was quick and easy. Deluxe room is wonderfull, more then spacious, nice view through big windows (from 9th floor) and walk-in closet. Bed is very comfortable (there is no king size bed, only two twin beds). Bathroom is spacious too, separated bathtub and walk-in shower, with very rich amenities. Staff at the reception is very helpful and have good recommendation for restaurants. At weekends you can take breakfast until 11.30 (excelled after Berlin’s nightlife). I must say that breakfast is really 5*, colorful and rich. Hotel also has spa area (gym + sauna). As I saw, gym is brand new, basic equipment but enough for regular training. Sauna is also nice, not so specious, but clean (you have sauna and steam bath). Only minus is that hotel doesn’t have pool. If you want you can order second cleaning for you room, which is a plus. Also hotel has many conference rooms and well equipped Business Center. Wi-Fi is complementary for hotel guest, and it is really high-speed. Overall, great hotel in the heart of West Berlin, nice room, helpful stuff, delicious cuisine and not so far from any transportation point in the city.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT STAFF & GREAT ACCOMMODATION = PERFECT”
Reviews.Author: EGGBY
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from a weekend stay in Berlin in the beautiful Hotel Concorde! This was a surprise for my partner and a first trip to this city for both of us. Firstly we LOVED Berlin! If you have not been there then contact your travel agent today! The city is so rich culturally and emotionally that the 3 days we had were not nearly enough and we are planning a return in June for my partner's birthday! The hotel is stunning with a very minimalist but comfortable style. Rooms have been well described on this site already so I wont bore with more details. We booked a Club Etoile room and so benefitted from a dedicated lounge which we were taken to for check-in. The facilities are great as are the breakfast, snacks and beverages you can enjoy throughout the day. Must mention SONIA, KAI and ADIL who provided us with personal and friendly service every day! We are looking forward to our next stay already! PS We did miss tea facilities in the room but now know you can request a kettle!! Note to management that a card offering this service might be an additional benefit for your guests.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel...Shame about the staff”
Reviews.Author: NadaQ
Reviews.Content: Went to this hotel for a conference, really lovely hotel, fantastic location but very rude reception staff on check in, bad first impression though Emily was wonderful and very apologetic when she overheard her colleague. Great location, brilliant base. Mild food poisining from breakfast unfortunately - never really had such a bad hotel experience overall and I travel a lot so was disappointed as this was first time in Berlin, my aunt lived there and loved it but didn't quite have the same appeal for me.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, smart hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Andricia
Reviews.Content: Great location just off the Ku'damm - swish, smart, excellent service and lovely spacious room. Definitely geared towards the business traveller but it provides a great base for a few days visiting Berlin. Free wifi great. Friendly and efficient service. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: SafirMD
Reviews.Content: We where so pleased with out stay. Nice and big rooms, so clean and a very friendly staff. The breakfast was very good, and we enjoyed our stay. Great location. We had drinks in the bar each nigth, and the bartender was very professional and friendly, and made us the best coctails.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel near Kufürstendamm”
Reviews.Author: Frimodig
Reviews.Content: A modern luxury hotel in the heart of Berlin's Kufürstendamm. Upon arrival we were able to checkin immediately at 8 o'clock in the morning since they had rooms available and were offered a room upgrade at a very reasonable rate. We also asked for and received a late checkout without an extra charge. The (upgraded) room was extremely spacious, 46m2, clean and modern looking with a king-size bed, smallish flat-screen TV, writing desk and chair and a small armchair. There was both a minibar and in-room safe as well as enough hanging and shelf space to accommodate an average couple for weeks worth of clothes. The bathroom had two sinks, a separate bath and shower and organic bathroom products. The only quibble I would have with the room is that for a room that size it was somewhat sparsely furnished. The room could have easily fitted for example a sofa instead of the the armchair. Overall every detail in the hotel from the service to the decor spoke of quality and I would definitely stay again and recommend it to anyone looking for quality accommodation in Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Spacious and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: PDFLondon
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here several times over the last 4 months and it is consistently a comfortable and relaxing stay. The rooms are clean and spacious with the usual features one would expect; however, the free wifi, despite it's variable speed and strength, is a bonus. The main restaurant is excellent and highly recommended. Overall a safe bet in a good shopping location.

Reviews.Title: “Not much to complain about at all!”
Reviews.Author: fogbrain_freefairy
Reviews.Content: Not having stayed in Berlin before I booked a superior double, as I expected an affordable city cente room to be small. I probably needn't have bothered - the superior was enormous, about 8m by 4m, plus the bathroom. Super king bed (usual trick of two singles together, but we hardly noticed the join) which we found very comfortable because it was very firm. Bath and large shower section, twin basins - extravagance that we didn't do justice to. All well appointed, clean, no noise. Staff are as smiley and helpful as others have said - the porter patiently helping me through the wifi connection procedure was much appreciated. Good transport connections - direct and frequent trains from Schönefeld to Zoo station which is about five minutes walk, and from Zoo station you can get to most places of interest by S-Bahn, U-Bahn, or bus, and to most others with just one change. Unusual feature - daily 'credits' to be spent in the restaurant or bar.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing!”
Reviews.Author: harrysmum2008
Reviews.Content: Me and my husband just got back from this hotel after spending 3 nights there for our honeymoon ! The rooms were spacious and clean the location was perfect and all the staff were very friendly and helpfull Woukd definatly recommend .

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay at !”
Reviews.Author: Akilili
Reviews.Content: Very easy to get to, central location, close to bus and metro stations, walking distance to many shopping areas. Very efficient and helpful staff. Comfortable room. Made our stay worthwhile

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in good location”
Reviews.Author: cowchaser
Reviews.Content: Swift checkin procedures but no early room available which was OK. We received a good offer on the breakfast for half price (the standard price is just way too much to ask for anyway) Clean rooms but no bottle of water and even a water coocker or coffee making facilities. This doesn't suite a 5 star hotel IMO. I mentioned this during checkout and received the reply that this is a known and frequently mentioned issue and discussions were ongoing to change that. Other than that a great hotel for great value in a great location at Kudamm with all shopping areas in the close vicinity.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Value”
Reviews.Author: A C
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 5 nights and enjoyed every second. located on the luxurious Kudamm street this hotel is very clean, nice, fancy and great value for money. excellent staff and not expensive.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location and Amazing Service”
Reviews.Author: Dennis A
Reviews.Content: I had the opportunity to spend a few weeks at this hotel in Germany and I have to say they hotel could not have been more friendly and well appointed. The Manager even send me a bottle of wine for my birthday to the room. The front desk staff was very helpful and informative with all my requests and questions. The hotel bar is slightly small but the bartender was always prompt with a drink. Very well located to be able to do anything you wanted to do in Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel , Super location”
Reviews.Author: MaureenErn
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent three nights at the hotel. The staff was very friendly, the check in outstanding. The rooms were spacious, loved the design. the cocktails at the bar were very good. Great location at Kurfürstendamm. Will definately stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Still perfect!!”
Reviews.Author: 12345Haifa
Reviews.Content: It was my third stay in Hotel Concorde, and it is still the best hotel I have ever stayed in. I arrived quite early in the morning, so my room was not ready yet. I was promised that they would make every effort to clean it soon, but even when I returned at late noon it was not ready. The man in the front desk could not have been nicer. He offered me and my friend free drinks in the lobby, and 15 minutes later I was told it was ready. When I entered my room there was a bottle of Champagne and a beautiful fruit plate waiting for me. What a lovely way to apologize. The room, as always, was big, sparkling clean, with a very comfortable bed. The view to Ku-Damm was a nice bonus too during the Advent before Christmas. The breakfast was excellent as I remembered, but I must say that 29 Euros is a lot to pay. I was happy that it was offered to me for 19 Euros. Also a nice touch for a returning visitor. The location, although not a walking distance from the main sights on the eastern part of Berlin (especially in winter...), is very very convenient: Only 2 minutes walk to Ku-Damm U-bahn, and perfect location for shopping and Christmas markets. There is no doubt I will visit Berlin again, and Hotel Concorde will be my first choice also next time!!

Reviews.Title: “Top class hotel”
Reviews.Author: bjarne_gallros
Reviews.Content: We had a three night stay in Berling December 4-7 2011. This hotel is close to Kurfursten and at this time of the year there are a lot of Christmas markets there. Very comfortable rooms and friendly staff. Concierge could arrange tickets for us at a short notice to a variety at Wintergarten (which is highly recommended to visit). Close to shopping (Karstadt) as well.

Reviews.Title: “good location and very comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: nurit76
Reviews.Content: Istayed the 2nd time in this nice comfortable hotel ! stayed in the smoking floor in a very nice and even big deluxe room -last time i stayed in a bigger room- junior suit-the breakfast is great and very tasty although i missed the german sort of herring !?? the location is excellent for shopping+ restaurants and the porters are very polite and very efficent and helpful!!

Reviews.Title: “Efficient and Good Service”
Reviews.Author: Oberoi_SahlHasheesh
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Hotel Concorde in Berlin during a Trade Fair in February and was impressed by the quality of the product and the service. Nothing was too much trouble for the staff who were a delight. A good restaurant as well where we had a great steak and efficient service. Will definitely stay there again on my next visit.

Reviews.Title: “it was perfect in every way”
Reviews.Author: wattenwo
Reviews.Content: the staff are ultra friendly, the bar is excellent, breakfast is as good as you can get and the location in top. the concierge gave top addresses for dinner

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: 543eric
Reviews.Content: Excellent location on Kurfurstendam. Nice and clean room and very very nice friendly employees!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: Mauricio_Prado
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 04 nights in november. Everything was absolutey fine. Big room, great breakfast, friendly staff, nice location. I would recommend this hotel!!!

Reviews.Title: “A real Zen-experience in the heart of the luxury shopping district close to public transport”
Reviews.Author: Gerd-X10
Reviews.Content: Extremely friendly staff, spacy room, modern interior design, excellent restaurant (Faubourgh), clean, indoor car park, quiet side street,... Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel in Berlin”
Reviews.Author: VancTraveller
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Concorde Berlin several times, the most recent in July 2011 with a family group of 7. The rooms are very large, modern and comfortable. The location just off the main shopping street is very convenient and several U-Bahn and S-Bahn stations are nearby, including the Zoologischer Garten train which has direct train connections to Munich. Breakfast was included in our rate and it was very good, but it is expensive if not included in your room rate. The concierge was most helpful in arranging our airport and hotel transfers each way, our private tours, dinner reservations and even a Chinese language newspaper for my parents (quite a feat for Germany!). One particularly worthwhile sight was the Reichstag. Dinner was a bit expensive but the view from the dome and while walking up the dome is spectacular even on the rainly cloudy day we were there and would be beyond compare on a better day. Berlin is generally very good value for 4 or 5 star hotels compared to other major capitals in the world. I've tried several Berlin 4 or 5 star hotels, but the Hotel Concorde Berlin is and remains my definite first choice for Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Just great”
Reviews.Author: Moman1974
Reviews.Content: Now I admit I stayed here on a company trip so did not pay for my one night stay so know idea what it cost? But awesome hotel breakfast was busy only just found place to sit but fantastic - self service and the choice options overwhelming you name it they had for breakfast - I must had the equilvant of 4 breakfasts could help myself so much to try. My room was massive and bath room was huge brilliant shower - recommend highly

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel ....got a huge deal through Booking.Com”
Reviews.Author: AvivaH
Reviews.Content: In our second visit to Berlin , I was looking for an elegant hotel at a central location that will contribute to our city experience. While browsing to see the best deals in Berlin, I got a great deal through Booking. Com - which made the whole stay at Concorde Hotel a wonderful experiece. The hotel is high class , with very large rooms (33 sqm) . The breakfast was incredible with such a high variety of food that we did not eat lunch later on...The service was very friendly and helpful and made our whole stay a treat. The location is also very very good - near the ZOO stations and Ku'sdam street. To make it short , we will surely come back whenever in Berlin !

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: George B
Reviews.Content: Location is very good: just next to Ku'damm (~50 m) yet not on the main street which means it is quieter. It is very much accessible as it is 10 mins walking from Zoologische Garten station. There is a Vapiano (Italian chain) just next to the entrance which might be convenient (it was for us) Rooms: spacious, well designed, nice colors and wood. Bathroom is really big and nice with separated shower and toilet cabins and bath in the main area. Good selection of TV channels. Free Wi-Fi internet with decent speed. Staff: very nice and helpful. Lobby bar: very good espresso! I had two in a row. One thing to take into consideration: by default, there are not tea amenities in rooms. I called the hotel and they arranged a tea kettle and mugs. We usually bring our own tea but in this case we had to. To sum things up: very very good!, we strongly recommend it. Bring your own tea. Another tip: KaDeWe has an excellent choice of teas, you can buy it there.

Reviews.Title: “A fine hotel but be aware”
Reviews.Author: BJC883
Reviews.Content: It is a very modern hotel and might not appeal to those who seek Warm atmosphere, modern architecture can be quite cold. Staff are very helpful. Room is very good and spacious. The breakfast is a fine feast. Warning- Tea and coffee not available in the room- 2 teas 18 Euro, bit steep if your staying there. Location is good for many restaurants for variety of budgets. Sights and rail station only 2 euro 30 cents away on the Sbahn.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Good Value”
Reviews.Author: HappyTraveler2002
Reviews.Content: Spent 5 days there in August 2011. Great location 5 minute walk from Zoogarten U-Bahn Station. Concierge staff very helpful with directions, suggestions and providing tickets. Exercise room and sauna were welcome pleasures at the beginning and end of the day. Complimentary computers in the Business center, available 24 hours per day, so was able to print boarding passes for on-ward flight. Room was large, especially by European standards with very comfortable bed and we had a view of Augsburger Strasse from the window. The only drawback was the 14 Euro very expensive breakfast; we ate out every morning for less than half of that. Otherwise we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Central, modern luxury hotel”
Reviews.Author: FlyingFinn
Reviews.Content: I just love the modern, airy architecture of the hotel. Not only the public spaces are grand, but the standard room is big with huge luxorious bathroom. The meeting rooms are beautiful and well catered. The location is unbeatable in West-Berlin (of course there are another hotels close by...). The service is friendly and prompt.

Reviews.Title: “Near to shopping centre”
Reviews.Author: Dr100
Reviews.Content: Overall god, have limited irons and iron boards. Would not recommend room service. Better eat outside, many restaurants to try.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, efficient & well located”
Reviews.Author: Sarsy47
Reviews.Content: I stayed with my partner and his parents for 3 nights over the Berlin Marathon weekend at end of Sept 11, partner was running. We really enjoyed our stay in this hotel which is friendly, nicely designed, very clean, efficient and clearly well managed. We were given rooms next to each other which was a nice thought on their behalf. The location is very good for shopping and is walking distance to some good restaurants and cafes of all price ranges. Its easy to get cabs right outside the hotel and the door men are very good. We caught a cab to the Brandenburg Gate to go to the Reichstag and then walked back through the parks, it would be a bit of a way for some but not if you are a walker. The rooms were lovely, great bathrooms with very nice separate showers. Breakfast buffet had every choice you could probably want even for Marathon Runners and friendly staff. Highly recommended by us.

Reviews.Title: “Nice building; pity about all the rest”
Reviews.Author: spanner48
Reviews.Content: The Concorde is a newly-built block, just off Ku'damm and close to the Zoo. So, well located. Our room was roomy, beautifully fitted out, comfortable and - for city-centre - quiet. Now the bad bits: 1: The whole place was consistently over-heated. We were there in September, and we sweated all the time we were in the hotel. We asked several times for the temperature to be turned down a bit. Others were complaining about it at the same time; nothing happened. 2: There are no stairs. Everyone has to use the lifts, which are inadequate and slow. 3: The breakfast buffet is simply an insult. Euros 28, for a breakfast that might be fair value at Euros 8. No ''light breakfast'' option. 4: Food: strictly institutional. Prettily prepared, but very standard and, mostly, over-cooked. 5: Service. A disaster area. We had arranged shipping of our conference stand with one concierge, and completed the documentation. When we came to leave, a different concierge demanded a new and completely different set of documents, and wanted to have our Passports. We had to leave, lugging 40 kilos of stand elements with us, rather than put up with the bureaucracy. Exactly the opposite of what a concierge is MEANT to do. And, when we asked to see a manager - any manager - we were told that ''he had left, and that would not be possible''. 6: No early check-in; no late check-out. Even against a room supplement. This hotel basically lives on conferences and trade fairs - for which it is just adequate. Otherwise, I would not touch it with a barge-pole.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: stevemhall
Reviews.Content: Stunning Hotel. We stayed for 3 nights and had a suite on the 9th floor. Room was very bright, modern and airy. Lots of of space (3 single beds, sofa, dressing area, desk and room to spare). Large bathroom suite with separate bath and walk-in shower. Well located just off the main shopping street and surrounded by lots of bars and restaurants. Nice area. Close to the main Zoologischer Garten Station (direct train from Schonefeld Airport). Breakfast was fabulous! Buffet style but with a chef to cook pancakes, eggs, waffles, etc to order.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: D_Wms25
Reviews.Content: After fleeing from another hotel, I walked in to the Hotel Concorde Berlin. I walked into paradise. The room was large, the amenities were wonderful - continental breakfast every morning - the staff was very attentive and friendly. I'd stayed at the Concorde de Layfayette in Paris and this one exemplified the service and superior standard I've come to expect. This location is close to restaurants, shops and public transportation.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, careful of room choice”
Reviews.Author: chashk
Reviews.Content: A good location close to the Tiergaten, shops, bars and restaurants. Good room size and spacious bathroom for a European hotel and for the price. However, the airconditioning could not be controlled manually and if you opened the window the sound of partygoers below made it hard to sleep. A good breakfast selection, and friendly helpful staff. Very small windowless gym, so rather make use of the nearby Tiergarten for exercise.

Reviews.Title: “Actually, a very fine hotel.”
Reviews.Author: JonahIreland_Germany
Reviews.Content: The staff here make the place, the hotel is an ultra modern building, not particularly pretty but the warmth of the welcome, the attention to detail make this more than a business hotel. Check in very efficient, porters exceptional whether a taxi or an umbrella required. I got an excellent four night bed and breakfast deal and what a breakfast, dedicated tea menu, but the level of sewrvice was phenomenal. I had pre dinner drinks in the bar each evening and again the service was professional and discreet. Lunch in theh restaurant on one afternoon a triumph!!! Location is not bad, a few metres from the Ku Dam. It was my first time to Berlin and I have been completely one over by this cosmopolitan city.

Reviews.Title: “Superb”
Reviews.Author: UpfrontAustralia
Reviews.Content: A faultless experience from the moment the car stopped out the front. Room, bar, restaurant, breakfast, laundry and overall service friendliness can't be faulted.

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms & good breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Anne1223
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 nights and would stay again if we were to return to Berlin. Our room was very spacious and clean. The bathroom was very nice as well - separate shower stall, tub, toilet, and a double sink. Free wi-fi was available, although they had to set up a router in our room (this was done quickly, so not a problem). The breakfast buffet had a large selection of food (e.g., multiple varieties fruit, bread, cold cuts, etc) that was always being replenished by staff. You could also get eggs and a few other items made to order as well. Breakfast was expensive, but we were happy we got it. We drove to Berlin and the parking garage underneath the hotel was convenient. The area in which the hotel was located was clean and safe.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Hotel...Friendly, Beautiful and Great Value”
Reviews.Author: LoveToTravel021961
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 5 days in August. It's location is excellent being close to the train station and right next to the main shopping area in West Berlin. It is a very safe area. The staff were very friendly and helpful. Our room was huge and yet very reasonably priced. The decor is very, very nice. We had a little trouble maintaing a consistent wireless signal in our room but when I called the front desk they said no problem, we'll install a modem in your room. In just 10 minutes, they came up to the room and we had our own personal modem installed. Amazing! I will definately stay at this hotel again! Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “An absolute gem and the BEST hotel I've ever stayed in!”
Reviews.Author: 4n6geekette
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed in the Concorde while in Berlin for a long weekend. It is quite easily the nicest hotel we've ever stayed in, definitely deserving of its five star rating. We booked an executive room with Expedia, which was a huge quality step up in room for only a little more cost. I highly recommend the Executive floors when staying at this property. The additional amenities provided by the Club Etoile for breakfast, recommedations, and lounge, as well as private check-in are more than worth the additional cost. The hotel staff is friendly and helpful and fluent in at least three languages (German, French, and English from our experience). They will solve your discomfort problems and you only have to ask. If you don't ask, well... your fault... :o) The concierge desk is extremely helpful and more than happy to provide solutions from a tourist discount card to tour tickets, directions, maps, or advice. This hotel was our refuge during a very busy four days in Berlin!

Reviews.Title: “Very good, I recommend!”
Reviews.Author: Dag-911
Reviews.Content: Great place for business and resting. Situated in the heart of Berlin center Kudamm. Service quiet and very good. The best option is to take upper floors, than you got nicer breakfast on upper floor.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay hope to go back soon”
Reviews.Author: Parisia
Reviews.Content: The Concorde Berlin is outstanding. Starting at the front doors when they take care of your car to the fantastic room. The service at the front desk is courteous and really great. We got exactly the room we were expecting for at a higher level when I expressed my main concern, I always like to get a nice view ourtside. It seems easy and simple for them to answer right away my concern to propose a room with a view. Actually I know Concorde hotels since a long time and one again I was not deceived at all just wish they have more hotels in Europe. Thank you for a wonderful time at the Concorde Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: alpha-tourist
Reviews.Content: I wil definitely return to this hotel. The location was superb, the rooms clean and comfortable (King size bed) and the breakfast was amazing. The hotel staff were extrememly helpful

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, definitely will stay again.”
Reviews.Author: christinej133
Reviews.Content: We are delighted that we chose to stay at the Concorde for our 3 night trip to Berlin. It could not have been better for us. We had booked an executive room as we wanted access to Club Etoile but on arrival we were lucky enough to be upgraded to an executive suite, which was fabulous - we could have lived in it! The room & indeed the whole hotel was kept immaculately clean all the time. We found ALL the staff efficient, friendly, pleasant & very helpful, in particular the gentleman & the young lady that were in charge of Club Etoile on the days we were there, 12th - 15th Aug. The breakfast was good, with lots of choice & something to suit everyone, good coffee too. We didn't eat in the hotel restaurant or use the gym so I can't comment on those areas. The hotel is in a brilliant location, close to the underground station. All the public transport in Berlin is great, buses, trains & underground, clean & tidy & all run on time! Very easy to get around all areas of Berlin. There was far too much for us to see in the short time we were there so we would like to go back. Which is unusual for us as we have so many places we would like to visit that we rarely consider re visiting anywhere. When we do return to Berlin we shall definitely stay at the Concorde without hesitation, staying there made our trip for us, we had a fantastic long weekend. Thank you Concorde!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Spacious and Friendly Service”
Reviews.Author: Pcrots
Reviews.Content: I booked the Concorde Hotel for a weekend break in Berlin for my Fiancé's birthday in August based on the reviews I found on Tripadvisor and I wasn't disappointed. The rooms were very spacious and clean. The staff were very friendly and attentive. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous hotel in a great area”
Reviews.Author: ChrisBros
Reviews.Content: This is a good hotel with huge rooms and big bathrooms. We stayed there for a weekend and used the spa facilities. Its clean and simple. The hotel is in an area where you can find good restaurants and nice shops. Take the underground from the airport. Very easy :)

Reviews.Title: “Terrific Place”
Reviews.Author: TorontoTraveller43
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here for 4 nights in a deluxe room. It was quite spacious and very comfortable. This is an updated business hotel and so the stellar room condition was not surprising. We got a very good rate, albeit it did not include breakfast, and I assume this was because we traveled when business traffic may have been reduced. Breakfast was 28 Euros per person but they did offer some deals on this as we checked in. However, we found nearby places on Joachimstrasse and on the Ku'dam itself to have breakfast so this was not an issue. The hotel is located near the shopping district and near the U-bahn station so is very convenient (we took a cab in from Tegel Airport). We would love to come back to this hotel when next we are in Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly located, beautiful room”
Reviews.Author: Evasarahbez
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located 15 minutes away from the airport by bus, but very close to sites and the city center. The staff was very welcoming and helpful. The room was a great value: spacious, modern, very clean and with a large bathroom including a tub and adjacent shower. The hotel bar was equally charming. We would definitely stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “With a Good Rate It Was Excellent Value In An Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: joe57
Reviews.Content: I came to Berlin with my son on a first-time visit to see the sights and a Bundesliga match, so under those circumstances not really looking for a 5-star hotel. However, found a very good offer on the net, and booked. For most (of our) purposes the location just off the Kurfurstendamm is very good. Bus 109 connects from/to Tegel, the metro within the city and a lot of shopping, incl. the KaDeWe and bars/restaurants/caffees (try the Berliner Kaffeerösterei for breakfast) close by, as well as stops for the sightseeing buses. The room is one of the biggest I've stayed in, and no fault with the bathroom, either. Everything is clean and spotless. Everything works. But at 3. floor, no real views, so you might want to try higher up. Everyone was polite and helpful. The one minus is the list-price of 28€ for the breakfast, which was very good, but not luxorious. Did not use the business center of fitness center. Overall, for the holiday offer pricing, it was excellent value in a 5-star hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and Location”
Reviews.Author: oswegobag
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Hotel Concorde Berlin for 2 nights. The value was great based on it's central location to sites and the public transport as well as the cleanliness of rooms and friendliness of the staff. Everything was clean, comfortable and ideally located. Best "bang for your buck" in a central location. One complaint though, was that there was no coffee available without going to the restaurant and paying about 3 Euros. There should be free coffee available, especially based on the other high levels of service we received. Tip: If you are trying to save money, do not take a taxi to the hotel. Use the express bus from Tegel Airport to the Zoological Garten Stop. Only a 5 minute walk from the station. Would stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: DKIlovelondon
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel due to it's location just off Kurfürstendamm. There's a U-bahn just on the corner, as well as several buss stops nearby. The staff were very friendly and helpfull at times some of the receptionists seemed a bit too reserved for our taste. We prefer smiling and greetings, but they met all our requests. We were first given a room on the back of the hotel with the view of a wall. We asked for another room and were given one towards the street. Despite facing the street the room was very quiet. The beds were very nice and we both slept well. The bathroom was spacious with both shower and tub - as well as speakers connected to the television, so I could follow the Porsche Cup while in the tub :) There's also free internet by cable in the room. The cleaning was spotless. In short; this is a wonderful hotel, with an almost perfect location for shopping and sightseeing. Concerning location, the only slightly annoying thing is that you can't go by U-bahn to Brandenburger Tor or Under Dem Linden without changing several times, but this has got nothing to do with the hotel. We chose to have breakfast at the hotel. The selection of diary, pastries, fruits and warm dishes is very good indeed. The scrambled eggs were disappointing, but we're quite picky when it comes to scrambled eggs. The selection of beverages is also great, even champagne is included - though not Möet, Mumm or Dom. But at 28 euros per person it's quite expensive. There's also an restaurant for the executive rooms called the Etoile but we didn't go there. If you choose to park at the hotel add another 18 euros per day. But when all things are added up we'll definitely stay here again, when we return to Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Didn't Love It. Won't Be Back”
Reviews.Author: ReindeerSpotting
Reviews.Content: This place is actually fine, but lacking in personality - not the fault of the staff, who are friendly, but just the scale and nature of the hotel. I just took against it, because I was tired on arrival and after I'd got my room key sorted, made my way over to the lift which had a slot to push the key into and select the room; anyway, I tried this for about 3 minutes before heading back to reception, where I was told that I didn't need to put the room key into the slot to select the room and that actually I'd disabled the process by doing that. ARG. No clock in the room = more ARG. No ironing board = further ARG. The location isn't too bad, but not exactly foxy either if you're looking for dead central. Breakfast just too expensive. But free WIFI, so points for that..

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Concorde - Mostly for businessmen”
Reviews.Author: Norwegian_couple4
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Hotel Concorde , Berlin for 2 days in June 2011. Our aim was to explore the city for the first time. It is a design hotel situated at Kurfurstendamm (which is NOT downtown, but the old shopping area in West Berlin). The Metro was very close and it was easy to get around the city. However, we were there for tourism and 90% were businessmen in dark suits, so it was not a hotel to make new acquaintenses for us. The room was big and luxurious and the maintainance very good. The free wifi in every room from the brouchures was a lan connection, but we got a router connected after some hours of waiting. In total, next time I will stay at a tourist hotel close to the Brandenburger Tor. But for most businessmen (which I am not), it is not so recommandable.

Reviews.Title: “Really nice service, excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: minty77
Reviews.Content: I stayed during month of middle july, the hotel is really good priced for the size of the room and the quality of service. The location is very good too if you like shopping. There's a diner that's open 24hours across the street which I found very convenient. The rooms are spacious, free wifi, I got twin rooms and didn't pay a lot, but the room came with spacious bathroom, bath, sep shower, two sinks, and bathrobe. The room was really clean and everyone was nice there and so helpful at the lobby. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to stay in berlin and I would def stay there again. Book it!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding in all ways”
Reviews.Author: EricaTO
Reviews.Content: This hotel was impeccable-excellent service, large comfortable rooms, and a truly outstanding concierge service. The breakfast buffet was the largest we have ever seen. We'd stay here again in a heartbeat. Only caveat--think twice about the overpriced, somewhat pretentious restaurant (Le Faubourg).

Reviews.Title: “I'll be back!!!!”
Reviews.Author: emmessduesseldorf
Reviews.Content: A weekend at the Concorde is a traditional event in my family's calendar. So this year was the sixth time we spent there and it was fabulous as ever. From the minute I walked - rather wet - through the door I was being taken care of. There are dozens of highclass hotels in Berlin but concorde's staff makes it outstanding. Whether it was the porter who helped me with my luggage in the rain or the coffee which came (room service) within seconds of being ordered or the housekeeping who enquired about the cleanliness of the room, - staff was as usual: terrific. The location is excellent, their business centre (free internet) very well equipped and three times in a row I have praised their breakfast buffet. So why do I give only four points? Because the tiles of the walk - in shower are dangerously slippery.

Reviews.Title: “fantastic hotel”
Reviews.Author: scotlandlee
Reviews.Content: My friend and I stayed at the Hotel Concorde for 3 nights in July this year. It was my first time in Berlin. The room (327) was HUGE!! as was the en suite. Everything was ultra-clean and very quiet. It is on the Ku'damm, very close to the Kaiser Memorial Church and the zoo and Tiergarten. We were room only (28 Euros for breakfast is a tad pricey!! Walk across the street to Caras coffee house and a superb americano and muffin and carton of fresh fruit is about 8 Euros) The only down side was that the bar beside the reception has little appeal. I believe if you pay extra you can get a card that enables you to go to a roof top bar with various treats on offer. The cost for myself and friend for this plus breakfasts would have been 180 Euros, but we wanted to see Berlin and not just the inside of the hotel so we declined. The Vapiano bar/cafe is next door to the hotel and has a really good atmosphere every evening. Pizzas excellent! You get a card on entry, choose your food at various counters and pay on leaving. (Vapiano near Sony centre is too busy with big queues). I have no hesitation in recommending the Hotel Concorde and will return! Also visit the beer garden near the zoo - great atmosphere.

Reviews.Title: “Great location & breakfast”
Reviews.Author: molly1234
Reviews.Content: Nice modern rooms, fabulous location right near underground, restaurants, tour busses and shops. A tad expensive but worth it especially if you time is limited. Breakfast with eggs cooked to order was one of the best I have ever experienced. Free internet in rooms and free use of the internet/computers in the business center. Conceriege was very helpful too.y

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel on the Ku'damm”
Reviews.Author: tr40
Reviews.Content: We had a very pleasant 3 days stay at the Concorde Hotel. Everything was great from arrival to departure. Friendly greeting from doorman, who showed us the way to the underground parking where the luggage porter was waiting. Fast check in, and we were guided to the room. Room had a nice contemporary décor, great bathroom and a nice view. Location is 50 meters from Ku’damm. Good fitness and wellness center. Well assorted breakfast buffet and an excellent bar&staff. Check out was fast and professional. We didn’t dine at the restaurant but menu looked good. All in all this is our hotel in Berlin in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Good Location but poor Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: FarangBangkok
Reviews.Content: We arrived at 10:30 am after an overnight flight, we were promised a early check in but on arrival were told that was not guaranteed, so we had to spend 2 hours in the lobby. I laid on a leather sofa and was told "take your foot off" no please or thank you. We had to keep asking if a room was available but they kept saying just another 15 mins. They even gave a room to someone who checked in after us. The room were functional and the breakfast OK but the customer service especially at the reception was poor. Perhaps this was because we were on a business trip not tourists. Good location for both business and site seeing.

Reviews.Title: “perfect..!”
Reviews.Author: LauraMGS
Reviews.Content: I chose this hotel based on other tripadvisor reviews, and I must say I agree with all of them: The hotel is great. Prior to our arrival in Berlin, we had been traveling in Scandinavia, so the price of this hotel, paired up with their excelent performance, was a wonderful improvement. The buffet breakfast was not included in the rate I had agreed on, but they offered it to me and my husband. 28 euro seemed like a little too much, but we decided to go for it. It was the best breakfast buffet I had ever seen. Only one little detail kept our stay from being perfect: we could not get a singe smile from the otherwise polite and well informed concierge.

Reviews.Title: “A good time in Berlin”
Reviews.Author: Gunnar057
Reviews.Content: The Concorde has a perfect location. Close to public transport, restaurants and sightseeing bus stops. The room was pristine, large and quiet. Bathroom had separate toiletroom, shower and bathtub. Staff were polite, hellpful and friendly. I can recomend the Concorde.

Reviews.Title: “Great rooms, convenient location but expecting more value for money for services.”
Reviews.Author: Toulcaz31
Reviews.Content: The hotel is close to the zoological garden which is a very convenient station for buses, u-bahn and s-bahn (if you want to go to Potsdam for instance). Take the bus to go to Brandenburg area. The room was great, big and very clean. The only small downside is on the service side. We got to call several times to get some things we asked (wifi, toiletries). The food (room service) was ok but forgettable.

Reviews.Title: “Simply perfection”
Reviews.Author: misterminute
Reviews.Content: When booking at this hotel we were not to shure as it looked much like one of these regular business hotels like the Radisson SAS, Hilton, Marriott etc etc. We hate these hotels as they have no individuality and service is nice and polite but nothing else. Simply made for the business traveller. However we were proven wrong! The hotel, even though large and modern, got a very comfortable and relaxing atmosphere. Hard to tell why - but somehow is works. It's a very nice and good looking hotel indeed. Front door guys are cool, polite and very helpful. The same goes for the reception staff and for everybody at this hotel. Only thing is that the woman in the reception suddenly changed into a sales agent during check-in trying to sell upgrades and breakfast. This was quite annoying as the "super offer" was nothing else than what we allready had been suggested when making the booking. The rooms are lovely decorated and large (we booked an upgraded room). Bathrooms are spacious and nice. Super with toilet and shower in seperate small rooms inside the bathroom. Room service is spot on as everything else at this hotel. Lobby area, bar and so in is smart looking and very nice. Super service. We couldn't find even a small service flaw or anything during our stay. Didn't check out the spa area. Location is good. One should however be aware that visiting Berlin consist of travelling. The city doesn't have one main center but consist of many small cities put together. Probably since is was seperated for so many years. However this area is nice, it's with easy access to the rest of the city and there are many shops, nice restaurants and bars around the area. FREE WIRELESS INTERNET throughout the intire hotel! My God how fantastic not paying EUR 50,- or something for 2 hours. Who needs to be on the internet for 2 running hours when in a hotel? This is the most irritating thing at any hotel. Finally a hotel that GOT IT right! You get a login and a password when you check in. Perfect for both the tourist traveller or business traveller.

Reviews.Title: “I would definitely stay there again!”
Reviews.Author: guklein
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel! The room was very spacious, clean, quiet, well decorated and the bed was very comfortable. The staff is really friendly and helpful. The location is perfect, near restaurants, shops, and a sightseeing bus stop.

Reviews.Title: “TOTALLY PERFECT!”
Reviews.Author: upiafifuddin
Reviews.Content: We arrive at 8 am after 18 hours flight. We are ready to drop our baggage and waiting for a check in time. But it was not happenned, they greet us and process the check in very quick, and apologize because the other connected room are not ready yet- and of course its was ok. the room was spacious- and clean. they settle a wifi router im the room. and open the connectig door when its ready without us asking. the hotel have superb location. Its only 50 m from Kurfurstendam but no noise of that busy road. It near Zoological Garden which provide train and bus to almost everywhere we like.

Reviews.Title: “Modern, smart hotel”
Reviews.Author: MuddyBath
Reviews.Content: Top quality hotel. Pleasant room, bathroom huge. It's just not in a very interesting area (near the zoo), unless you like shopping. My rate did not include breakfast, so I've no idea what that is like.

Reviews.Title: “AA1, Better than excellent!”
Reviews.Author: tcw4tcw
Reviews.Content: Had a wonderful stay here. Service, room, & breakfast were great. Good location.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location. Nice Size Rooms”
Reviews.Author: DallasJD6189
Reviews.Content: Was in Berlin for a week recently for my birthday. This hotel is in a great location with easy access to buses and other mass transit, shopping and many places to eat. The rooms were rather big and the bathrooms were very impressive. Bed was comfortable. Staff was attentive and friendly. I enjoyed the fitness center as well. Not overly big, pretty typical for most hotels. We did use the business center frequently for internet. I was not impressed with the internet service in the rooms. It was a hit or miss option. Not reliable, which is why we went to the business center. The only other nit pick was it was pretty sterile in it's design. Having been to so many Kimpton and W hotels, it was rather boring. But was clean and quiet. I would stay there again though as the value was definitley worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, very good service, good value”
Reviews.Author: GaryKarr
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here on our first trip ever to Berlin. Everyone on the hotel staff was friendly, the decor was up-to-date and interesting (but not too avant-garde) and we didn't feel like we were in just some generic hotel. The hotel is well-situated for travel throughout Berlin, within walking distance of the U-bahn and the KaDeWe department store. If we're fortunate enough to come back to Berlin, this will be one of the top hotels to consider.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding hotel and service.”
Reviews.Author: brommy
Reviews.Content: My wife and I booked a standard room on the executive floor for two nights over the weekend of our 17th wedding anniversary (Saturday 25th June 2011). The ground floor receptionist escorted us up to the 11th floor Club Etoile lounge and introduced us to the executive check-in desk staff. Jenny congratulated us on our impending anniversary and then escorted us to 1001. We were very pleased to see that it was a suite which included: a living room (with separate toilet/sink room), desk, mini bar and comfortable seating area; bedroom with very large bed and LCD TV; bathroom with twin sinks, bath, separate toilet room and large shower room; good sized walk-in wardrobe area which included a free electronic safe. The executive room rate included use of Club Etoile so we enjoyed breakfast, drinks and snacks during our stay. On Saturday, after a Segway tour of Berlin and wading through the gay parade crowds, we headed straight for the relaxing surrounding of the club lounge to enjoy an afternoon drink. The lounge staff kindly presented us with an anniversary cake. Their service throughout our stay was outstanding - professional but friendly and always with a smile. For the standard of service and quality rooms and fittings the Hotel Concorde Berlin represents excellent value for money. Thank you Concorde Berlin, we will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing!”
Reviews.Author: goldenspecial
Reviews.Content: A beautiful hotel with a great location. Very comfortable with a knowledgeable, friendly staff. I will not be staying anyplace else!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent all round”
Reviews.Author: shoody01
Reviews.Content: Very central location, staff friendly and knowledgable, hotel was clean and very well presented, food was brilliant. My trip was for business and I would definately used the conference facilities and would stay again for pleasure rather than business.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect, relaxed atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: groggery1
Reviews.Content: The Concord is a fabulous place to stay for a short trip to Berlin. Its laid back atmosphere masks a deceptively efficient hotel, where nothing is too much trouble for the cheery and helpful staff. The rooms are spacious, with good furnishings, nice art work and large bathrooms (with separate shower and double sinks for those that hate sharing). Including breakfast is expensive, but probably worth it on balance, with the chance to get freshly cooked eggs, pancakes or waffles if that takes your fancy. Concierge service is really good and reliable information is happily dispensed. The bar is expensive, but the modern art-decorated environment makes it a pleasant way to spend too much for a beer, and it is one of the few places where you can get a reliable Internet signal (there really is no excuse for this, other than a desire to get guests out of their room and spending their cash). Location is fine: plenty of restaurants nearby, and close to the cheap and ever reliable public transport system that only the Germans seem to be able to produce. The main Museums are a bus or metro ride away, but one is still delivered there with ruthless efficiency and for minimal cost. The fitness room is somewhat mediocre, though it should keep you ticking over, and the sauna is excellent for those happy to wander about naked as local custom demands. My only gripe are the bedcoverings, with their individual duvets for each side: very irritating, and makes for a lot of wrestling with the sheets.

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, good service as always”
Reviews.Author: hongkongmuimui
Reviews.Content: Been in this hotel several times, service is always good. The breakfast in the morning was great with a lot of choices. The room was in good size with good materials use on linen.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, no surprises”
Reviews.Author: pdw_bxl
Reviews.Content: 4 night stay at this hotel. Executive room & service are excellent. Location is great (near Zoologischer Garten).

Reviews.Title: “Top class all the way”
Reviews.Author: Tisco031
Reviews.Content: There´s really nothing to complain about this hotel! Good location by the U-bahn, plenty of good shopping and restaurants in the area, friendly staff, clean and big rooms with good design. Don´t hesitate if you´re going to Berlin for a couple of nights!

Reviews.Title: “Extremely good and well worth the money”
Reviews.Author: FredrikOlsson
Reviews.Content: This hotel is good quality in everything. The room was huge with a walk in closet on the way to the large bathroom. The bathroom was very large with separated room for the toilet, shower and the bath. When you book your room here make sure that you book a room that you get access to the Club Etoile were you get breakfast and also lunch and a bite and drink on the afternoon. This hotel is right on the shopping street and very close to KaDeWe among other stores. The staff is very friendly and speak German, French and English. However if you want to go to Unter den linden and Alexander platz the walk is quite long, maybe nice in the summer but in december I would recommend taking the buss.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel, good location and fantastic staff”
Reviews.Author: seminole_kev
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Hotel Concorde - Berlin for 3 nights on the executive level, and really enjoyed our time there. Very nice hotel with a good location for shopping and easy access to everything via Zoo station, but the people at the hotel are what made the stay. Fantastic and friendly staff that I cannot rave enough about. Especially the lady who's name I'm sadly forgetting who worked the Executive lounge most of the time that we were there.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: Wolfarama
Reviews.Content: First class in all respects. I stayed for 3 nights as the last after a month in Germany. It was worth every cent. If you want five star and are prepared to pay, you will not be disappointed. The staff are the most professional, friendly and helpful That I have come across in any hotel in the world.

Reviews.Title: “Quality Hotel.. great location..friendly helpful staff..pricey!”
Reviews.Author: clockman999
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 3 nights. Hotel is convenient for transport links, local shops and restaurants. Most of the main sites to see are walkable, but probably best combined with a travel card 3 days 25 euros.(All U/S trains and Buses.) Free WI Fi is good.. you will need a data cable - they will supply FOC. Breakfast was fab, room clean and spacious - had a problem with plumbing - soon fixed. Hotel prices were extremely high..bottle of Orangina from Mini Bar was 4-50 euros ..similar prices for food in restaurant . Dept store opposite great for shopping..sushi bar in basement .. ideal for room snacks, drinks etc ..as no Tea or Coffee facs in room. Several restaurants in area - best we found was called Diekmann - Bistro style, cosy fab food, and not expensive .... great wines .. just round trhe corner 5 mins from Hotel in Meineketstrasse ..highly recommended. Overall Hotel and staff were very good - just a shame about prices for dining in and other extras.

Reviews.Title: “Great and very nice hotel with spacious rooms at a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: socrates-junior
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very close to Ku'damm and public transport. It is very easy to check out the city from the hotel. The hotel rooms are very spacious, clean and with a modern look. The restaurant meals and breakfast was very good, very good atmosphere and a rich selection of food with very good quality. The staff was very friendly and helpful with the typical German correctness ;-) All in all a fantastic hotel that I can highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Location, location..”
Reviews.Author: RA123
Reviews.Content: The Concorde is very well situated for sightseeing, eating, shopping. Opposite the entrance of the hotel, there' a department store "Karstadt" - very good shoppping options for the entire family. There's a small supermarket in the basement - sorts out all water, snacks requirements. There's also an excellent ice-cream bar, champagne bar, and one or two other small eating bar areas. There's a buffet on the top floor - only had dessert there. The Concorde is just behind the Kurfurstendamm - Desigual, Levis, Benetton etc and of course the famous KaDeWe. The buffet on the top floor is excellent - well prepared foods (vegetarians are well catered for, also). On the lower floor there's the wonderful Gourmet areas - excellent small areas for sampling foods, ice-creams, coffees etc. The Berlin Zoo is just about a 10 minute walk away - I don't mean a trot-walk timing, I do mean about 10 minutes in normal walking! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here - breakfast was well catered, inlcuding an omelette/pancake/waffle station. Lots of wonderful vegetarian foods available. Service was excellent throughout the hotel - hope the service remains that way! Sometimes I find that when there are too many good reviews the hotel service tends to deteriorate - I sincerely hope that this doesn't happen.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel to spend your holidays”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I spent easter at Cancorde hotel and it was great! easy to take the tube, very friendly staff. The bed was a little too hard for me but my husband loved it. I hightly recomend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience - great staff and excellent location!”
Reviews.Author: MissMcBridie
Reviews.Content: We booked the Hotel Concorde Berlin based on recommendations on Trip Advisor and were not disappointed. We booked directly with the hotel through their website and took advantage of their special winter prices (which were still valid through April). Our deal included access to Club Etoile lounge and while the overall price was not cheap it was certainly value for money as we were treated as VIP guests during our stay. Our room was a good size with everything you could need and was very clean. We had amazing view over the Berlin skyline and the hotel was located close to a number of U-ground stations and only a five minute walk to the Zoologischer Garten rail station from where you can get the Airport express to Berlin Schönefeld. There are a number of great attractions and restaurants within a few minutes’ walk of this hotel. All in all this was a great place to stay with friendly and helpful staff and I would highly recommend this to anyone visiting Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Affordable luxury where nothing was too much trouble.”
Reviews.Author: Spiritus26
Reviews.Content: High quality hotel which we got for £80 per night (room only). It was luxurious, comfortable and very well located. The staff offered excellent support when our WiFi would not work in the room. Breakfast is expensive but it is easy to get breakfast out and about so not a problem. When we arrived at midnight due to delays from snow they greeted us warmly and got us checked in very quickly. I really enjoyed the walk in shower, dual sinks and fluffy bathrobes after a long walk around the city in -10 and a foot of snow. I would not look another hotel in Berlin after this experience.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant stay in a modern sophisticated place;money well spent.”
Reviews.Author: jangrode
Reviews.Content: This is not a cheap place, but compared to many other hoteld in the same category this really is worth the price. The entire hotel is very well maintained, the rooms are spacious and furnished in modern design. The breakfast buffet is rich and offers something for everyone. This made our stay in Berlin very pleasant. Also a great location close to Kurfürstendamm, but not too noisy.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel in Heart of Berlin”
Reviews.Author: p8patyger
Reviews.Content: This hotel is stylish and modern in design. The room is big with lots of windows. The bathroom has a good layout, with double sinks. The elevators are of a good size (which is not a given in German hotels) and work fast. Staff speak English well and are helpful. They obtained a restaurant reservation for me promptly and thoroughly. My only complaint with the room is that the TV didn't work and it took two service staff to fix it. The free internet works without problems. The location of the hotel, being just off Kurfuerstendamm, is very central. Very close to the subway, shops and restaurants. I'd definitely stay at this hotel again next time I'm in Berlin. We walked to the zoo from the hotel to take the 100 and 200 bus which take you to most sights in the City.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: London_Guy99
Reviews.Content: My wife visited Berlin at the beginning of March 2011 and stayed at the Concorde. We had a comfortable stay. Pros: - Excellent breakfast. - Comfortable, modern rooms with spacious bathroom. - Convenient location 15 mins or so from Tegel Airport by Taxi. - Great shopping and restaurants near by - Easy access to public transportation and cabs (who are available outside the hotel 24/7) Cons: - Free internet suffered from a very weak signal and was constantly disconnecting - Mobile phone signals were very weak (not the hotels fault, but something to keep in mind if you depend on your mobile) - Bed was extremely hard - Shower head was poor and was covered in calcium/lime build up - If you are travelling to Berlin to take in the historical tourist sites, it may be more convenient to stay somewhere on the east side of the city. That being said, the the U-Bahn station is just down the road and it a quick and inexpensive journey by public transit.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location, Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: dsor
Reviews.Content: Ours was a one night stay, so we were glad to have been based in such a convenient central location. There is so much outstandingly good shopping in the immediate vicinity, as well as restaurants, etc. Various transport links are also immediately at hand. We had no complaints of any kind about any of the service we received. I simply cannot recall a better breakfast buffet - extensive, all beautifully presented, all fresh. The room is quite large and everything works well. There is a decent internet service, which is free of charge. Our room was superbly well sound proofed, and we slept excellently

Reviews.Title: “efficient but not friendly”
Reviews.Author: aprevin
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Concorde for a conference in Berlin. The hotel's location is excellent and close to the ICC. Shopping facilities around the hotel are excellent and kept my spouse busy :-) The rooms are equipped well for a business traveller and a definite plus is the free wifi. However the staff management needs desperately improvement. It seems that there is simply not enough staff to do the work at this busy place. Compared to other hotels of the same category there would be much more staff. I do not want to speak in general, but we had some encounters with unfriendly staff that should definitely not occur in "5-star" hotel like this: There was a long queue at the reception at check-out and all clerks were very busy. Suddenly a manager appeared additionally behind the desk (we assume he was some sort of supervisor, because he was not wearing a uniform and was older in age then the rest of the staff). It appeared to us he was disturbed in his office during some more relaxing work and came very grumpy to one of the computers at the reception and somehow shouted to the queueing people in the lobby they should come over to his place. No smile, no friendly word, no interest in how our stay was. We didn`t understand his mumbling that should have been a question and repeated it much louder and put a nerved face on as if he was talking to some sort of prison inhabitant. The credit card didn`t go through immediately and he rolled his eyes like we were stealing his precious time. After our check-out was done, we had to wait some time till our luggage was brought down and we kept on watching him. He was simply rude to everyone! We were not the exception. We wondered why such a obviously snotnosed, unmotivated and naughty person is allowed to work in the hospitality business. And (if he is really is a manager) which example is he to his co-workers? How much can a person like this ruin the reputation of a hotel? That is scandalous - we think. Unfortunately this occurrence overshadowed our opinion of the Concorde and we will not return to this place.

Reviews.Title: “I was an invisible guest at the Concorde Hotel, Berlin”
Reviews.Author: 1PerfectGuest
Reviews.Content: I shared the room with a colleague and shared the expenses. The reservation was made under both our names. Upon arrival I approached the Reception, and the front desk clerk did not find a reservation under my name. When she found a reservation under my colleague's name, she stopped talking to me and started addressing only the 'registered' guest. I thought that was pretty rude for such a nice hotel. She did not offer to add my name to the reservation. We had to specifically request that. When I tried to login to use the internet, I was prompted to use 'last name' and 'room number'. When I wrote my name it did not work. It did work with my colleague's last name. When I asked the clerk if I could have a login she told me plainly 'No. You are not the main guest', you need to write your colleague's name and she proceeded to give me the spelling of my colleague's last name. I told her I knew my colleague's name, that this was not a 'spelling' problem, to what she reminded me that I was not the 'registered' guest. My colleague told her that I was pretty upset and felt very unwelcome at the hotel. There were two people in the room, but only one was acknowledged. The Front Desk agent apologized to my colleague but never did anything to make me feel like I was also a valued guest of the hotel. I stayed 5 days at the hotel attending a tourism convention. I have been in the hotel business for over 20 years and all along I felt that they were consistently short and rude to the 'not-main' guest. This is my third stay at this hotel (and last) and I always got the same feeling of only one guest being a 'real' guest and the one receiving all the attention and courtesy, while the other, the 'not-main' guest is totally irrelevant and overlooked. Do people at the Concorde Hotel remember they are in the hospitality business? Concorde Hotel: Auf Wiedersehen!

Reviews.Title: “excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: Italtom77
Reviews.Content: room clean, spacious, comfortable and big bathroom. great hotel.

Reviews.Title: “this hotel ticks all the boxes”
Reviews.Author: normCork
Reviews.Content: great central location but not too busy accomodation and facilities perfect lots of staff all very helpful be sure to include the best ever breakfast when booking

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC HOTEL, AMAZING SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: LRoutledge
Reviews.Content: The hotel is beautiful with tasteful decor and the standards of cleanliness are very good. The staff are very friendly and helpful and everyone speaks fluent English which is just as well considering my GCSE level German is all but useless. The hotel is located in one of the main shopping districts of Berlin and is 5 minutes walk from the main train station and a number of undergrounds. The hotels gym, although small, has some very good quality equipment and is kept spotlessly clean. We thought the hotel was fantastic and wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service and room quality”
Reviews.Author: willandlauren
Reviews.Content: We stayed here at the end of January 2011 and were very impressed with the great service and quality of all amenities within this hotel. We have stayed in 5 star hotels previously but found Concorde Berlin to exceed all our expectations. We would definitely recommend this hotel to friends and colleagues and it would certainly be our first choice if we were to stay in Berlin again. Staff were only too eager to help with any questions about the city and as a business centre for the conference we attended the facilities were second to none. With a great breakfast and restaurant Concorde should be at the top of anyones list for places to stay in Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Just what I was Looking for”
Reviews.Author: MCZAR1
Reviews.Content: We stayed here over the thanksgiving week. I was able to stay on the club level in a suite due to an excellent deal available on their website. I would highly recommend checking their website for deals before booking . The hotel is situated in the western section of Berlin. It is close to a subway stop and very convienent for shopping and the giant KaDeWe department store. The staff during the check in process were very professional yet very friendly, making us feel almost at home. The room was quite large, very clean and the cleaning staff did a superb job of cleaning. The furntiure is modern and looks to be rather new Internet access was included in the room rate which is a definite bonus as many hotels continue to charge extra for what internet access. All of the staff we had contact with were great. I would also highly recommend the breakfast buffet. It was offered every day and included almost everything one could want. There was an omelet station where they also made waffles. There was the typical American breakfast fare, several fresh yogurt options as well as a more traditional European breakfast. We stayed there for 4 nights and have nothing negative to report. They even had a electrical converter to use for our laptop and to recharge our cell phones. I only wish I could have stayed longer.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxed stay, super staff and hughe room.”
Reviews.Author: Kellyco79
Reviews.Content: We booked a deluxe room and had one on the 5the floor, big and nice decorated and with a great bathroom. Staff is superfriendly and housekeeping excellent. We had 4 relaxed days. The only bad point at this hotel is the lack of a coffee/tea kettle.. a nespresso would fit perfect. Missing details are : more international TV channels: The possibility to plug in an MP3 on the bathroom speakers ( the speakers we really appriciated, it's just a bit useless if you got only german Tv or 3 radiostations with advertising to play in the bathroom): You can't open a window, airco/heating works perfect but I would prefer an open window to sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and a nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: KatyerFin
Reviews.Content: Great location near the shopping street KuDamm (Kurfürstendamm) and near to the shopping center KaDeWe. You can use the public transportation to get to the East Berlin, where there are historical sights. At the end of November there were plenty of Christmas markets (Weihnachtsmarkt), which I would definitely recommend. There was one just around the corner by the Kaiser Wilhelm Kirche. The Staff was very helpful and polite. They gave us great recommendations and thanks to them we did find a great restaurant.
